svg:
do not change viewbox, unless you update the svg to match viewbox sets the coordinate scale inside the svg which will automatically be scaled to whatever you set in CSS help this is overwhelming and i dont like it basically, it's just describing the picture, similar to HTML
this defines a mask, which cuts the plus shape from the circle this is then used later when the circle is actually defined
first, fill the masking canvas with white this will allow the element being masked to show through think of it like the opposite of Figura's emissives fully white will do nothing at all to the base texture while full black will make the base texture fully transparent
now I put both lines in a group so both of their properties can be changed at once black will create transparency when the mask is applied
apparently live share doesn't support viewing uploaded pngs uh oh now I apply the mask, which will cut a plus into the circle and fill the circle with the color provided by CSS
oh by the way plain text like this is perfectly valid svg and will be ignored
oh, then why are you commenting lol? because I forgot mood
